caption: The man rests his head on his hand and sighs. He then carries the woman forward on his back. As the sky gets darker, the man places some glowing objects on the ground. He takes out a device and continues his calculations. The woman hands a photo to the man. The man puts a holographic projector on the ground, and in front of them, an image of another girl appears. After the projection fades, they lie down to sleep. Suddenly, the glowing objects on the ground start emitting a red light. The man wakes the woman. He takes a gun and leads her forward. They take shelter in a cave. A massive, bizarre-looking creature with a gaping mouth approaches them. The man raises his gun and opens fire.
